"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung oder kenntnis? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

(translation: "why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without our consent or knowledge? #dataprivacy #privacy #security")

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and using personal data without proper consent or transparency. it questions the current state of data privacy practices and calls for better protection of individuals' personal information. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
